div.head: 百精老物
div.div: all types of ancient spirit beings

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: all types of ancient spirit beings

sense.def: Etiological Agent. identical with e gui 惡鬼 , malign demon. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry sheng ma 升麻： 主解百毒，殺百精老物殃鬼，辟温疫，瘴氣，邪氣，蠱毒 , “It controls the dissolution of all types of poison. It kills all types of ancient spirit beings and calamitous demons, and eliminates warmth epidemics, miasmatic qi, evil qi, and gu poison”.
